name: Le dernier duel
description:
"Le dernier duel" is a turn-based board game/fighting game.

You will find yourself on the battlefield and there are only two warriors left.

You must quickly find a more powerful weapon than the one you already have. Once the two warriors in hand-to-hand combat, the last duel begins until only one remains.

Game made as part of my web developer training at OpenClassrooms

Good fight !
